data.actual_result: It appears as though you shouldn't be able to press it (see attached picture)
data.short_description: In Channel Settings under Frequency, the "All Messages" dot (on the right) appears dim, like you shouldn't be able to click it (happens on all servers regardless of perms)
data.steps_to_repro: - Channel Settings - Frequency - Observe the shaded in dot of "All Messages"
